trans-unit.source: Provides the data portion of an <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce la parte di dati di un <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageList"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This is a sealed class, so you can not inherit from it.
trans-unit.target: Si tratta di una classe sealed, pertanto non è possibile ereditare da esso.

trans-unit.source: Also, the constructor is private, so you cannot create a new instance of it.
trans-unit.target: Inoltre, il costruttore è privato, non è possibile creare una nuova istanza.

trans-unit.source: An ImageListStreamer is returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageStream%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>.

However, you cannot use this class to load images to an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> control by directly assigning the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageStream%2A> property from one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, è possibile utilizzare questa classe per caricare immagini in un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>controllo assegnando direttamente la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageStream%2A>proprietà da uno <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageStream%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>

trans-unit.source: Instead you should directly assign one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> instance to another (for example, `ImageList2 = ImageList1)`.
trans-unit.target: È invece necessario assegnare direttamente uno <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>istanza a un'altra (ad esempio, `ImageList2 = ImageList1)`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia tutte le risorse usate dall'istanza corrente del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare `Dispose` quando si è terminato di utilizzare <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer>

trans-unit.source: The `Dispose` method leaves the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Il `Dispose` metodo lascia la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer>in uno stato inutilizzabile.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer>

trans-unit.source: After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Dopo la chiamata `Dispose`, è necessario rilasciare tutti i riferimenti al <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer>in modo che il garbage collector può recuperare la memoria che di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer>occupata.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [la pulizia di risorse non gestite](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [implementazione di un metodo Dispose](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Chiamare sempre `Dispose` prima di rilasciare l'ultimo riferimento a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, le risorse non vengono liberate finché il garbage collector chiama la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer>dell'oggetto `Finalize` metodo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageListStreamer>

trans-unit.source: Populates a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> with the data needed to serialize the target object.
trans-unit.target: Popola un <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> con i dati necessari per serializzare l'oggetto di destinazione.

trans-unit.source: For more information and a code example, see <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni e un esempio di codice, vedere <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable?displayProperty=fullName>
Il <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> da popolare con i dati.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that is the destination for this serialization.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>che rappresenta la destinazione per questa serializzazione.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> cannot be populated with data because no data exists, or it is not in the correct format.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> non può essere popolata con dati perché i dati non esistano o non è nel formato corretto.
